content: Hello! I'm doing metaprogramming (in MetaM and the likes). I have an inductive in the form of a Name, and I would like to query some information such as the number and type of the parameters, the names of the constructors, the types of the arguments of each constructor, etc. What are the relevant APIs?
You want to fetch an Environment through getEnv and then call functions like Environment.find?
Mathis Bouverot-Dupuis has marked this topic as resolved.
